data: In the retired village of Deane, in Yorkshire, lived for many years one of those unfortunate females ycleped an old maid; a title which generally exposes the possessor to every species of contempt, however inoffensive, or even worthy, the individual may be, thus unluckily designated.
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: british literature
